original_title: Lunar Jim - Up Up and Way!
overview: Lunar Jim is a true adventurer who will transport preschoolers into an exciting world of discovery, fun and adventure. Lunar Jim and his friends are an intrepid group of astronauts living in a tiny little village called Moona Luna. A village much like any other but with one big difference. It's on the moon! It's a special place where the unexpected and fantastic can and does happen. Episode list: Pest Problems; Forget Me Nots; Jim Gets Mucky; Up Up & Away; Recipes for Rover & Running on Empty.
title: Lunar Jim - Up Up and Way!
